翲字的基本解释

翲
piāo
轻：“律历更相治，间不容翲忽。”
高飞。

翲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piāo］
［《廣韻》撫昭切，平宵，滂。］
［《廣韻》匹妙切，去笑，滂。］
［《集韻》紕招切，平宵，滂。］
轻貌。

翲字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翲； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页959第14
【廣韻】撫招切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】紕招切，?音漂。高飛也。【類篇】翲翲，飛也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?匹妙切，音剽。義同。

翲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
翲字的起名意思

暂无。

翲
Basic explanation of words
翲
piāo
Light: "Law and calendar are more intertwined, and there is no room for neglect."
Goofy.
翲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [piāo]
["Guangyun" Fu Zhaoqie, Ping Xiao, Pang. ]
["Guangyun" is a wonderful cut, laugh, grimacing. ]
["Ji Yun" 纰Zhao cut, flat night, punishing. ]
Light-looking.
翲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [The Department of Yu Zi] 　翲; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: Page 959 14
[Guang Yun] strokes and cuts [Jiyun] [Rhymes] [Zheng Yun] Zhuo cuts, sound drifts. Goofy too. 【Classes】Kuikui, Feiye.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? A piece of wonderful cut, the sound is plucked. The same meaning.
